Uses of Class
remodel.meta.Rule

Packages that use Rule 
Package Description
remodel.meta
Metamodel components to represent ReMoDeL models, metamodels and transformations.

  • Uses of Rule in remodel.meta

    Subclasses of Rule in remodel.meta 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  FunctionRule
    A FunctionRule is a helper-function computing an intermediate result.
    class  MappingRule
    MappingRule is a transformation rule that maps from a single source to a single target.
    class  MergingRule
    MergingRule is a transformation rule that maps from multiple sources to a single target.
    class  UpdatingRule
    UpdatingRule is a transformation rule that updates the source and returns this as the target.
    Methods in remodel.meta that return Rule 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Rule Transform.getTopRule()
    Returns the top Rule in this Transform's set of rules.
    Methods in remodel.meta that return types with arguments of type Rule 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Rule> Transform.getRules()
    Returns a list of this Transform's Rules in the order they were added.
    Methods in remodel.meta with parameters of type Rule 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Transform.addRule​(Rule rule)
    Adds a Rule to this Transform.
